pages.text: $(li)Raccoon are neutral gray small mammals that they can be found over the Overwold.$(br)$(li)They are known thief that often steals food out $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chests$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/barrels)Barrels$(/l).$(br)$(li)They will pilfer items from $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:villagers/wandering_trader)Wandering Traders$(/l). Those items will appear in the Raccoon's mouth.

$(li)They can be tamed if given a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/chicken_egg)Chicken's Egg$(/l) near water where them were able to wash it.$(br)$(li)Tamed Raccoons can be made to sit, follow, wander.$(br)$(li)They can be given carpets and will gain bandanas dependind of the color of carpet used.
